name: The Thick Table Tavern
description:
The Thick Table Tavern

One dream. Fourteen days. Serve drinks and gather enough tips to make it happen in time. Or choose chaos and mix whatever you feel like, damned the consequences.

This game was created for the 28th Edition of the IF Comp. Further updates are to be expected in the future (TBA).

Features:
  • A Story Mode with 6 Endings, 3 difficulty levels for the mixing components, and randomly generated paths.
  • An Arcade Mode, where you can mix drinks to your heart's content, with 3 game types: Endless, Perfection and Timed. 
  • Play with mouse or keyboard (press H for the Key-bind menu).

Content warning: mention and use of alcohol, mention of violence, lewd language and swearing, animated text and background (can be toggled off)

Note on Mobile: While it is technically possible to play the game on mobile, the game has not been designed with mobile format in mind. Please take this into account when playing. 

Bugs: 

  • If you encounter a bug, please send a report to manonamora.games@gmail.com
  • If you encounter a GroundHog Day-type of bug (where the event of the day repeats itself), this is a known cache issue. The only fix is to empty your cache (and lose your progress).
